body: Life as an artist isn't all it's cracked up to be, Herm.
I woke up this morning and I couldn't paint! No inspiration, no nothing!
I need to see something new. Maybe that'll help me get out of this block...
You know, it's always been my dream to travel the world and see all that it has to offer!
Maybe this will be the push I need to get the creative juices flowing again.

option_text: Would seeing the stars help your creative problems?
body: I'm sure it would, but I don't see how a glass jar is going to help me do that!
Hmm... I guess I'll give it a go all the same. Nothing ventured, nothing gained...
